additional_info:
Jacuzzi, Storeroom, Wardrobe, Furniture, Technique, Intercom, Telephone, Internet, Cable-TV, Security, Alarm System, Duplex, Elevator, Generator, Heating system: central, Hot water: gas, electricity 
 Just renovated beautiful duplex appartment in a new building with a stunning panoramic view over Tbilisi which situated in the central of Tbilisi in Vake district on Tskhvedadze street. You can walk from the main Abashidze street or you  can come from the side of Turtle Lake with wonderful alley which leads to the building. Half distance from the building you can reach Turtle Lake and Vake Park where one can enjoy nice nature environment and fresh air.
On the first floor there are: storage and 2 bath-rooms (equipped with new branded washing machine and drier machine), kitchen (25 m2) with new electro techniques facilities, kitchen has nice balcony (12 m2) faces into the beautiful garden. The living room (60m2) has big marble fire-place (with wood storage), also the room has balcony (23m2). There are also 2 extra-rooms with independent hall, one can be used as office (20m2), another for guest bedroom (15m2). On the second floor there are a big master bed-room with private bathroom and Jacuzzi (45 m2).
Another big light room with nice view (37m2) can be transformed into 2 bedrooms. One more bathroom with steam-shower box is located on the second floor.
The most beautiful place is a big terrace (60m2) with nice flowers and bushes, big wood table and chairs you can sit and enjoy the beautiful panoramic view of Tbilisi. Small pool and finish sauna can be installed on the terrace. In the night time terrace is specially lighted that gives more charm to it. There are 2 places in garage with remote control door.
